name: Dungeon Survivor Shooter
description:
Name - Dungeon Survivor Shooter

Type - Action Survivor with RPG Elements

Game Engine - Unity3D

Platform - Mobile

Dungeon Survivor Shooter is a magical FPS with RPG elements where you will control a magician who is venturing into a cave in search of challenges, treasures and hone your skills. There are several enemies scattered around the cave where the player will have to defeat them to get the spoils and get stronger to face new and more powerful enemies.
